bottle.name: NV Curieuse Vin Blanc
bottle.short_tasting_note: A unique wine that combines aromatic Viognier with fruity Pinot Gris. Elevated acidity and a mineral core balance the rich fruit flavors of white peach, honeysuckle, vanilla and baking spice.
bottle.tasting_note: Elevated acidity and a mineral core balance the rich fruit flavors of white peach, honeysuckle, vanilla and baking spice. A blend of aromatic Viognier, fermented in new French oak barrels, and fruity Pinot Gris, a varietal not commonly found in the South of France, combine to make a unique wine that deserves an exceptional meal, perhaps of butter-poached lobster, herb-roasted chicken, or roasted pork loin with stone fruit.
